links: Ivan Panchenko, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
formula: 8-spoke wheel overlays prime number spiral; hub is 2 in shell 0; 8 spokes radiate from this hub; this is West, clockwise.
example: Begin a prime number spiral at shell 0 (prime 2), proceed clockwise, West.
author: _Enoch Haga_ and _G. L. Honaker, Jr._, Apr 10 2000
